These Terms and Conditions govern the provision of electrical services by A1 Electrical Constructions Limited ("A1 Electrical", "we", "us", or "our"). By engaging our services, you agree to these terms.

## Quotes and Estimates

- Quotes are valid for 30 days from the date of issue unless otherwise stated
- Quotes are based on information provided at the time of assessment
- Additional work discovered during the job may incur additional charges
- We will discuss any significant variations before proceeding

## Payment Terms

- Payment is due on completion of work unless otherwise agreed
- For larger projects, progress payments may be required
- Trade accounts are available for approved customers (20th of month following)
- We accept cash, cheque, bank transfer, and major credit cards
- Late payments may incur additional charges

## Warranties and Guarantees

- All workmanship is guaranteed for 12 months from completion
- Manufacturer warranties apply to products and equipment we supply
- Warranty does not cover damage from misuse, modification, or third-party interference
- Claims must be made promptly upon discovering any defect

## Compliance and Certification

- All electrical work is performed by registered electricians
- Work is completed in accordance with NZ electrical safety standards
- Certificates of Compliance are provided for all prescribed electrical work
- We maintain current registration with the Electrical Workers Registration Board

## Access and Site Conditions

- You must provide safe access to the work area
- Work areas should be clear of obstructions where possible
- We will take reasonable care to protect your property
- Any pre-existing damage should be noted before work commences

## Cancellations

- Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before scheduled work
- Cancellations with less notice may incur a call-out fee
- Materials ordered specifically for your job may be non-refundable

## Liability

- We carry public liability and professional indemnity insurance
- Our liability is limited to the value of the work performed
- We are not liable for indirect or consequential losses
- Claims must be made within a reasonable timeframe

## Health and Safety

- We maintain Gold SiteWise certification for health and safety
- We comply with all relevant health and safety legislation
- You must advise us of any hazards on your property
- Work may be suspended if unsafe conditions are identified

## Disputes

- Any disputes should first be raised with our office
- We aim to resolve issues promptly and fairly
- Unresolved disputes may be referred to the Disputes Tribunal or courts of New Zealand

## Full Terms

These are summary terms and conditions. For our full terms, please contact our office or request a copy before engaging our services.

## Contact Us

If you have questions about these terms, contact us at:

**A1 Electrical Constructions Limited**
405 Kaikorai Valley Road
Dunedin 9011
Phone: 021 453 193
Email: admin@a1electrical.co.nz

A1 Electrical Constructions Limited ("A1 Electrical", "we", "us", or "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you use our website or services.

## Information We Collect

When you contact us or use our services, we may collect:

- **Contact information** such as your name, address, phone number, and email address
- **Project information** related to the electrical work you require
- **Payment information** necessary to process transactions
- **Communications** including emails, phone calls, and messages you send us

We collect only the information necessary to provide our services and respond to your enquiries.

## How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:

- Provide quotes and estimates for electrical work
- Schedule and complete electrical services
- Communicate with you about your project
- Process payments and maintain financial records
- Send you relevant information about our services (with your consent)
- Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
- Improve our services and customer experience

## Sharing Your Information

We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with:

- **Service providers** who assist us in operating our business (e.g., accounting software, email services)
- **Regulatory bodies** such as the Electrical Workers Registration Board where required
- **Other parties** when required by law or to protect our legal rights

## Data Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorised access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure.

## Your Rights

Under the New Zealand Privacy Act 2020, you have the right to:

- Access your personal information
- Request correction of inaccurate information
- Request deletion of your information (subject to legal requirements)

To exercise these rights, contact us at admin@a1electrical.co.nz.

## Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The date above reflects the most recent revision. Continued use of our services after changes indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

## Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your information, contact us at:

**A1 Electrical Constructions Limited**
405 Kaikorai Valley Road
Dunedin 9011
Phone: 021 453 193
Email: admin@a1electrical.co.nz

Comprehensive electrical services for businesses, retail, hospitality, and industrial clients. From fit-outs to maintenance, we keep your business running.
Professional electrical solutions for commercial, retail, and industrial businesses.

## Overview

A1 Electrical provides reliable commercial electrical services to businesses throughout Dunedin and Otago. We understand that downtime costs money, so we work efficiently and can schedule work to minimise disruption to your operations.

## Commercial Services

- **Office fit-outs** - Power, data, and lighting for workspaces
- **Retail installations** - Display lighting, point-of-sale power, signage
- **Hospitality** - Kitchen equipment, bar installations, ambient lighting
- **Warehouse and industrial** - Three-phase power, machinery connections
- **Healthcare facilities** - Compliant installations for medical environments

## What We Provide

### New Fit-Outs
Complete electrical design and installation for new commercial spaces. We work with your designers and builders to deliver on time and on budget.

### Upgrades and Additions
Expand your electrical capacity, add new circuits, or upgrade to more efficient lighting without disrupting your business.

### Maintenance Programs
Preventive maintenance to keep your electrical systems reliable. Scheduled inspections, testing, and repairs before problems occur.

### Emergency Response
When electrical issues threaten your business operations, we respond quickly to minimise downtime.

## Industries We Serve

- Retail and hospitality
- Offices and professional services
- Manufacturing and warehousing
- Healthcare and aged care
- Education facilities
- Sports and recreation

## Quality Assurance

All commercial work is completed to NZ standards with full documentation. We're SiteWise certified with Gold status, demonstrating our commitment to health and safety on commercial sites.

Expert electrical work for home renovations, extensions, and alterations. We upgrade and expand your electrical systems to match your improved living space.
Electrical upgrades and additions for renovations, extensions, and property improvements.
Switchboard upgrades to support new loads

## Overview

Renovating your home? Whether it's a kitchen makeover, bathroom upgrade, or whole-house renovation, A1 Electrical ensures your electrical systems keep pace with your improvements. We specialise in working within existing structures while minimising disruption.

## What We Provide

- **Kitchen electrical** - Additional circuits for appliances, under-cabinet lighting, rangehood connections
- **Bathroom electrical** - Heated towel rails, exhaust fans, lighting upgrades
- **Extensions** - Full electrical fit-out for new rooms and additions
- **Lighting upgrades** - Modern LED lighting, dimmers, and smart controls
- **Power upgrades** - Additional power points, USB outlets, outdoor power

## Common Renovation Projects

- Open-plan living conversions
- Kitchen and bathroom modernisation
- Garage and workshop fit-outs
- Home office installations
- Outdoor living areas

## Working with Older Homes

Dunedin has many character homes that require careful electrical work. We understand the unique challenges of working with older wiring systems and can assess whether upgrades or rewiring is needed.

## Quality Assurance

Every renovation project includes a thorough inspection of existing electrical systems. We'll identify any safety concerns and ensure all new work meets current standards. All work is certified and documented.

Professional electrical inspections for pre-purchase assessments, insurance requirements, and safety compliance. Detailed reports with clear recommendations.
Thorough electrical inspections and comprehensive reports for property purchases, insurance, and safety compliance.

## Overview

Whether you're buying a property, renting out a home, or need to meet insurance requirements, A1 Electrical provides thorough electrical inspections with detailed reports. Our Master Electricians identify issues before they become problems.

## Inspection Types

### Pre-Purchase Inspections
Before buying a property, know what you're getting into. We assess the electrical system's condition, identify any safety issues, and estimate costs for necessary upgrades.

### Landlord Compliance Inspections
Ensure your rental property meets healthy homes and electrical safety standards. We check all fixed electrical installations and provide documentation for your records.

### Insurance Inspections
Some insurance companies require electrical inspection reports for older properties. We provide comprehensive assessments that meet insurer requirements.

### Safety Audits
Regular safety inspections for commercial properties, workplaces, and high-risk environments.

## What We Inspect

- Switchboard condition and capacity
- Wiring age and condition
- Earthing and bonding
- Safety switches (RCDs)
- Power point and switch condition
- Light fittings and circuits
- Smoke alarm compliance
- Outdoor electrical installations

## Our Reports Include

- Overall condition assessment
- Safety issues identified
- Code compliance status
- Photographic evidence
- Prioritised recommendations
- Cost estimates for repairs
- Certification where applicable

## Quality Assurance

All inspections are conducted by registered electricians following industry standards. Reports are clear, thorough, and provided promptly to meet your deadlines.

Complete house rewiring and modern switchboard upgrades to improve safety and capacity. Essential for older homes and properties with outdated electrical systems.
Modernise your home's electrical system with professional rewiring and switchboard upgrades.

## Overview

Older homes often have electrical systems that can't safely meet modern demands. A1 Electrical provides complete rewiring services and switchboard upgrades to bring your property up to current safety standards while increasing capacity for today's electrical needs.

## Signs You May Need Rewiring

- Flickering lights or frequent blown fuses
- Two-pin power outlets (ungrounded)
- Fabric-covered or rubber-insulated wiring
- Burning smells or warm switches
- Frequent circuit breaker trips
- Home built before 1970

## Our Rewiring Services

- **Complete house rewiring** - Replace all old wiring with modern cable
- **Switchboard upgrades** - Modern circuit breakers and RCD protection
- **Capacity upgrades** - Increase electrical supply for modern demands
- **Earthing upgrades** - Proper grounding for safety
- **Meter board upgrades** - Work with power companies on supply upgrades

## The Rewiring Process

1. **Assessment** - Thorough inspection of existing wiring
2. **Quote** - Detailed scope and pricing
3. **Planning** - Minimise disruption to your daily life
4. **Installation** - Careful work to protect your property
5. **Testing** - Comprehensive safety testing
6. **Certification** - Full compliance documentation

## Switchboard Upgrades

Even if your wiring is sound, an outdated switchboard can be a safety concern. Modern switchboards with RCD protection can save lives by cutting power in milliseconds if a fault occurs.

## Quality Assurance

All rewiring work is completed to NZ standards with full certification. We use quality materials and tidy up thoroughly after the job is complete.

Professional heat pump installation and ventilation solutions for comfortable, healthy homes. We supply and install quality heating systems.
Keep your home comfortable year-round with professional heat pump and ventilation installation.

## Overview

Dunedin's climate demands reliable heating solutions. A1 Electrical supplies and installs quality heat pumps and ventilation systems to keep your home comfortable and healthy throughout the year.

## Heat Pump Services

- **Supply and install** - Quality heat pumps from leading brands
- **Wall-mounted units** - Ideal for living areas and bedrooms
- **High-wall and floor-console options** - Suit different room layouts
- **Multi-split systems** - One outdoor unit serving multiple rooms
- **Sizing advice** - Recommend the right capacity for your space

## Ventilation Solutions

- **Bathroom exhaust fans** - Remove moisture and prevent mould
- **Kitchen rangehoods** - Proper ventilation for cooking areas
- **Home ventilation systems** - Positive pressure systems for drier homes
- **Heat recovery ventilation** - Energy-efficient fresh air systems

## Why Heat Pumps?

Heat pumps are one of the most efficient ways to heat your home, providing both heating and cooling. Modern inverter heat pumps can deliver 3-4 units of heat for every unit of electricity used.

## Our Installation Process

1. **Site assessment** - Evaluate your space and heating needs
2. **Recommendation** - Suggest appropriate unit and placement
3. **Quote** - Clear pricing with no hidden costs
4. **Installation** - Professional installation by qualified technicians
5. **Commissioning** - Test and set up for optimal performance
6. **Handover** - Show you how to use your new system

## Quality Assurance

All heat pump installations include manufacturer warranty and our workmanship guarantee. We handle the complete installation including electrical connections and ensure proper operation before we leave.

Complete electrical installation for new residential and commercial construction projects. From initial design to final sign-off, we deliver quality electrical systems.
Full electrical installations for new construction, designed for safety, efficiency, and future-proofing.

## Overview

Building a new home or commercial space? A1 Electrical provides comprehensive electrical fit-out services from the ground up. We work closely with builders, architects, and homeowners to ensure your electrical systems are designed right from the start.

## What We Provide

- **Design consultation** - Work with you to plan electrical layouts that suit your lifestyle and budget
- **Full electrical installation** - All wiring, switchboards, power points, and lighting
- **Smart home integration** - Pre-wire for automation, security systems, and future technology
- **Energy efficiency** - LED lighting, efficient circuits, and solar-ready installations
- **Compliance certification** - All work certified and compliant with NZ standards

## Our Process

1. **Initial consultation** - Discuss your requirements and review plans
2. **Electrical design** - Create detailed electrical plans
3. **First fix** - Install cables and backing boxes during construction
4. **Second fix** - Install switches, sockets, and fixtures after plastering
5. **Final inspection** - Test all systems and provide compliance certificate

## Why Choose A1 Electrical

With over 40 years of experience in new builds, we understand the importance of getting it right the first time. Our team coordinates seamlessly with other trades to ensure your project stays on schedule.

## Quality Assurance

All new build installations come with full compliance certification and our workmanship guarantee. We use quality materials and follow best-practice installation methods for long-lasting results.

Protective covering for overhead power lines to prevent accidental contact. Essential for construction sites, tree work, and properties near power lines.
Safety solutions for work near overhead power lines, including protective wraps and tiger tails.

## Overview

When working near overhead power lines, safety is critical. A1 Electrical provides power line wrapping and tiger tail installation services to protect workers and equipment from accidental contact with live conductors.

## What Are Power Line Wraps?

Power line wraps (also called line guards or insulating covers) are protective shields installed over overhead power lines to prevent accidental contact during nearby work. While they don't make the lines safe to touch, they provide an additional layer of protection.

## Tiger Tails

Tiger tails are brightly coloured markers attached to power lines to increase visibility. They help machinery operators and workers see the power lines clearly, reducing the risk of accidental contact.

## When You Need This Service

- **Construction sites** - Crane operation, scaffolding, elevated work platforms
- **Tree work** - Trimming, felling, or removal near power lines
- **Building work** - Roofing, painting, or facade work near lines
- **Transport** - Moving oversized loads that may come close to lines

## Our Process

1. **Site assessment** - Evaluate the work area and power line configuration
2. **Coordination** - Work with network companies as required
3. **Installation** - Install wraps and/or tiger tails safely
4. **Documentation** - Provide records of installed protection
5. **Removal** - Remove equipment when work is complete

## Safety First

Working near power lines is inherently dangerous. Power line wraps and tiger tails are supplementary protection measures, not a substitute for proper clearance distances and safe work practices. We can advise on the appropriate safety measures for your situation.

## Quality Assurance

All power line protection work is carried out by qualified electricians following industry safety standards. We coordinate with network operators and provide documentation for your site safety records.

Modern smart home installations and outdoor electrical solutions. From automated lighting to garden power, we bring convenience and functionality to your property.
Upgrade your home with smart technology and professional outdoor electrical installations.
Smart home and outdoor electrical installation

## Overview

Transform your home with smart technology and extend your living space outdoors. A1 Electrical installs modern automation systems and outdoor electrical solutions that enhance convenience, security, and enjoyment of your property.

## Smart Home Solutions

- **Smart lighting** - Control lights from your phone or voice
- **Automated switches** - Timer and sensor-controlled lighting
- **Home automation** - Integrated control of multiple systems
- **Security wiring** - Camera and alarm system installation
- **Network cabling** - Structured data cabling for reliable connectivity

## Outdoor Electrical

- **Garden lighting** - Pathway, feature, and security lighting
- **Deck and patio power** - Convenient outdoor outlets
- **Spa and pool electrical** - Safe installation for water features
- **Shed and garage power** - Workshop and storage lighting and power
- **Gate and security** - Electric gate motors and intercoms

## Popular Projects

### Outdoor Living
Extend your entertaining space with weatherproof power points, feature lighting, and speaker systems for outdoor areas.

### Garden Lighting
Highlight landscaping features, illuminate pathways, and improve security with professionally installed outdoor lighting.

### Home Security
Integrated security systems with cameras, sensors, and monitoring capabilities, all properly wired for reliability.

## Quality Assurance

All outdoor installations use weatherproof components rated for New Zealand conditions. Smart home systems are configured and tested before handover, with full instructions provided.
